class WindowsInfo

supportsSymLinks

public boolean supportsSymLinks()
Specified by:
supportsSymLinks in interface OSInfo
Returns:
true if the OS I represent supports the concept of symbolic links and allows them to be tested from Java.

isSymLink

public boolean isSymLink(java.io.File aFile)
Description copied from interface: OSInfo
Tests for symbolic links in what could be an OS-dependent way.

Specified by:
isSymLink in interface OSInfo
Returns:
true if the file is a symbolic link or false if it isn't, or if the current OS doesn't support symbolic links.
